title: MMA Junkie Radio #2991: UFC on ESPN+ 19 preview, reaction to Jones-Adesanya feud, more
text:
Thursday’s edition of MMA Junkie Radio with hosts “Gorgeous” George and “Goze” is here!

Episode 2,991 of the podcast looks ahead to UFC on ESPN+ 19 this Saturday in Tampa, Fla., as well as reaction to the latest news and notes in MMA. The guys also discuss their visit to the Tyson Ranch for Dominance MMA media day earlier this week.

The rundown

Stream or download this and all episodes of MMA Junkie Radio over at AudioBoom, or check it out above. You can also catch it on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, and more. A new episode of the podcast is released every Monday and Thursday.
description: Hosts "Gorgeous" George and "Goze" break down the latest MMA news and notes, as well as look ahead to UFC Tampa.
